text: Anatoliy Lebid (; 8 September 1944) is a former professional Soviet football forward and coach. Lebid played 7 games in the Soviet Top League for FC Zorya Luhansk in 1967. His son, Vladimir Lebed, played for the Russia national football team. ==References == ==External links== * * Profile of Lebid at the Our Futbol Luhansk Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kherson Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Krystal Kherson players Category:FC Bukovyna Chernivtsi players Category:FC Metalist Kharkiv players Category:FC Zorya Luhansk players Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi players Category:FC Tytan Armyansk players Category:Soviet Top League players Category:Soviet football managers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Krystal Kherson managers Category:Association football forwards
title: Anatoliy Lebid
